text: Justine Ezarik (born March 20, 1984) is an American YouTuber, host, author and actress and the winner of the 7000th show The Price is Right. She is best known as iJustine, with over a billion views across her YouTube channels since 2006. She gained attention as a lifecaster who communicated directly with her millions of viewers on her Justin.tv channel, ijustine.tv. ==Other websites== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:American YouTubers Category:Actors from Pittsburgh
title: IJustine
